bibl.bibl: Lubbock, John William. 1830–2. Researches in physical astronomy. [Read 29 April and 9 December 1830; 19 May, 9 June, and 17 November 1831; 9 February, 7 June, and 21 June 1832.] Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society of London 120: 327–57; 121: 17– 66, 231–82, 283–98; 122: 1–49, 229-36, 361–81, 601–7.
